Odpoklic izdelka Celi mandlji

06 Nov 2019, 14:22


Ljubljana, 6. novembra - Podjetje Hofer je iz prodaje odpoklicalo izdelek Celi mandlji, 200 gramov, proizvajalca Happy Harvest, ker je bilo pri enem od rednih preverjanj kakovosti izdelkov ugotovljeno, da omenjeni izdelek ni varen za uživanje, saj je bila ugotovljena prisotnost salmonele.



Ljubljana. Odpoklic 200-gramskega pakiranja mandljev znamke Happy Harvest.Foto: Hofer Slovenija

Izdelek, ki ga dobavlja Märsch Importhandels GmbH, ima roka uporabnosti do 22. 4. 2020 in do 23. 4. 2020. Podjetje kupce prosi, da izdelek vrnejo na mesto nakupa, kjer jim bodo povrnili stroške. Če to ni mogoče, pa naj ga zavržejo. Izdelka kupci ne smejo uživati surovega. Če se ta naravni, neobdelani izdelek kljub temu uporablja kot sestavina za peko in se ga pred zaužitjem vsaj 10 minut segreva pri najmanj 80 stopinj Celzija, potem jed, v kateri so ena od sestavin mandlji, ni več nevarna za zdravje, so še sporočili iz podjetja.

Product recall Whole almonds

06 Nov 2019, 13:22


Ljubljana, November 6 - Hofer has recalled Happy Harvest's Whole Almond 200 gram from its sale, because one of its regular product quality checks found that the product was unsafe to eat as Salmonella was detected.



Ljubljana. Happy Harvest 200 grams of almond packs recalled. Photo: Hofer Slovenia

The product, supplied by Märsch Importhandels GmbH, has a shelf life until 22 April 2020 and until 23 April 2020. The company asks customers to return the product to the point of purchase, where they will be reimbursed. If that is not possible, they should be discarded. Buyers should not consume the product raw. If this natural, unprocessed product is nevertheless used as a baking ingredient and heated to at least 80 degrees Celsius for at least 10 minutes before ingestion, then a dish containing one of the almond ingredients is no longer a health hazard, business.
